mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT_REVIEW (PR_PO_NO, PR_P_PID, PR_U_ID, PR_STAR, PR_BODY, PR_IMAGES1, PR_IMAGES2, PR_IMAGES3) VALUES (#{reviewDTO.pr_po_no}, #{reviewDTO.pr_p_pid}, #{reviewDTO.pr_u_id}, #{reviewDTO.pr_star}, #{reviewDTO.pr_body}, #{reviewDTO.pr_images1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reviewDTO.pr_images2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reviewDTO.pr_images3,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
